articles.author: Alessandra Scotto di Santolo
articles.title: This is why we left! MEPs furious as unelected EU ignore requests on crucial vaccine rule - Daily Express
articles.description: MEMBERS of the European Parliament were infuriated when they were told by the European Council all their demands on vaccine certificates had been dismissed.

articles.description: Tottenham 1 Aston Villa 2 analysis | Aston Villa can take full advantage of the demise and toxicity at clubs such as Tottenham and Arsenal to catapult themselves back into European contention next season, writes Ashley Preece

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: World's biggest iceberg, dubbed A-76, spotted by satellite after calving from Antarctica - ABC News
articles.description: A giant slab of ice breaks from Antarctica and enters the Weddell Sea, becoming the largest iceberg currently afloat in the world, the European Space Agency says.
articles.content:
A giant slab of ice has broken from Antarctica and entered the Weddell Sea, becoming the largest iceberg currently afloat in the world, according to the European Space Agency.

articles.title: Vaccinated Travelers From 'Safe Countries' Will Be Allowed to Visit, European Union Says - The New York Times
articles.description: The bloc has reached an agreement on entry criteria for tourists who have had their shots and for those from “safe” countries. The changes could come into effect as early as next week.
